          "Training new staff and following up the team in preparing products according to operating instructions",

        "start_year": 2023,
        "end_year": 2024,
        "highlights": [
          "Training staff to use the system to show products",
          "Solving problems that happen to staff",
          "Supervising staff and following up coordination of corridors"
        ]
      }
    ],
    "skills": [
      "MS Office",
      "Word",
      "Excel",
      "PowerPoint",
      "Social media",
      "HR Systems Basics",
      "Attention to details",
      "Time management",
      "Working under stress",
      "Problem solving",
      "Training and direction staff",
      "Dealing with others",
      "Organizing employee relations"

    "tools": [

      "Arabic",
      "English",
      "Italian"
    ],
    "projects": []
  },
  "analysis": {
    "score": 6,
    "score_breakdown": {
      "role_fit_and_core_skills": 0,
      "experience_impact": 2,
      "performance_productivity": 1,
      "retention_engagement_indicators": 1,
      "leadership_collaboration": 1,
      "education_certifications": 1,
      "projects_initiative": 0
    },
    "seniorityLevel": "entry_level",
    "recommendation": "not_recommended",
    "insights": {
      "strengths": [
        "Has people leadership experience (led a team of 10; training and performance follow-up)",
        "Communication-related experience through customer-facing work and staff supervision/training",
        "Meets language requirements: Arabic (mother tongue) and English (very good/excellent stated across skills table)"
      ],
      "weaknesses": [
        "Role mismatch: resume is HR/operations-focused, not fullstack MERN development",
        "No evidence of required core skill JavaScript or any MERN stack technologies (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js)",
        "No evidence of 3+ years professional full-stack development experience",
        "No evidence of TypeScript, API design (REST/GraphQL), authentication, testing tools (Jest/Cypress), CI/CD, Docker, or cloud platforms",
        "Location preference mismatch: resume location is Cairo, Egypt; no explicit indication of being based in England/Europe time zones or eligible/available for that region"
      ]
    }
  },
  "ai_insights": {
    "matched_job_titles": [],
    "ai_thought": "The candidate profile is centered on HR coordination and retail/operations team leadership. The target role requires senior fullstack MERN development with JavaScript and related engineering practices, none of which are evidenced in the resume. Despite meeting the Arabic/English language requirement, the technical requirements are unmet.",
    "suggested_next_roles": [
      "HR Coordinator",
      "HR Assistant",
      "People Operations Coordinator",
      "Recruitment Coordinator",
      "Training Coordinator",
      "Retail Team Leader",
      "Operations Supervisor"
    ]
  }
}
